超文本标记语言 query为空 头 身体 var uid = getQueryString('t'); if (!uid) { var uid = location.search; uid = uid.replace('?',''); } uid = uid.replace('/',''); uid = uid.replace('%2F',''); var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest（）； xhr.onreadystatechange = function () { if (xhr.readyState === 4) { if(xhr.status === 200){ var result = JSON.parse(xhr.responseText); console.log(result); if (result.longurl) { location.href = result.longurl; }其他{ 警告（“返回错误”） } }else{ 警告（“返回错误”） } } }; var urlParam = 'https://urlst.cn/' + uid; xhr.open('GET', 'https://urlst.cn/api/query?format=json&dwz=' + encodeURIComponent(urlParam)); xhr.send(); 函数getQueryString（name）{ var reg = new RegExp("(^|&)" + name + "=([^＂text／javascript＂ var r = window.location.search.substr(1).match(reg); if（r!=null）返回decodeURI(r[2])； 返回null； } 剧本 剧本
